personal.name: Oliver Grudzinski
personal.title: Computer Science Student & Full Stack Engineer
description: Computer Science junior at MSOE and Full Stack Development Intern at TESCH Global, specializing in AI/ML systems, modern web applications, and scalable data solutions.

Passionate about leveraging cutting-edge technologies to solve complex technical challenges. Active member of MSOE AI Club and Society of Software Engineers, continuously exploring emerging innovations in machine learning and software architecture.
Eagle Scout with a proven track record of leadership, discipline, and delivering high-impact solutions.

expertise.title: Full-Stack Engineering
expertise.description: Building responsive, scalable web applications with React, TypeScript, Node.js, and modern frameworks. Focus on clean architecture and exceptional user experiences.

expertise.title: AI & Machine Learning
expertise.description: Developing intelligent systems using computer vision, NLP, and reinforcement learning. Expertise in PyTorch, TensorFlow, and LLM integration for production environments.

expertise.title: Agile Project Leadership
expertise.description: Leading cross-functional teams using Scrum and Agile methodologies. Driving efficient delivery through clear communication, iterative development, and strategic planning.

expertise.title: Backend & Cloud Architecture
expertise.description: Designing robust APIs, microservices, and database systems. Proficient in AWS, Docker, and building scalable cloud-native applications for high-performance computing.
